0.1.name: wordpress/info-box-on-new-postpage-editor
0.1.description:
Do you have multiple authors creating post/pages that you need to remind them of things while they are reminding. This plugin creates a little reminder box in the upper right corner of the Add Post and Add Page areas and gives you a page to add the reminders that you want to include.

(First published plugin so its a bit rough. Please forgive me)
